pr_title: chore(cli): pin cli version instead of latest on plugin generation

timeline.message: chore(cli): pin cli version instead of latest on plugin generation

timeline.bodyText:
We should allow a version range, otherwise it will install many different @capacitor/core packages.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  '@capacitor/core': `${cliVersion}`
          
          
            
                  '@capacitor/core': `^${cliVersion}`
timeline.author: imhoffd
imhoffd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -234,13 +235,13 @@ function generatePackageJSON(answers: NewPluginAnswers) {
     author: answers.author,
     license: answers.license,
     dependencies: {
-      '@capacitor/core': 'latest'
+      '@capacitor/core': `${cliVersion}`
     },
     devDependencies: {
       'rimraf': '^3.0.0',
       'typescript': '^3.2.4',
-      '@capacitor/ios': 'latest',
-      '@capacitor/android': 'latest'
+      '@capacitor/ios': `${cliVersion}`,
+      '@capacitor/android': `${cliVersion}`
